DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine the safety and efficacy of an investigational drug in patients with obesity plus extension.
DOC.brief_title: A Two Year Safety and Efficacy Study in Obese Patients (0364-015)(TERMINATED)
DOC.criteria: Obese patients with a body mass index between 30 kg/m2 and 43 kg/m2, inclusive (BMI between 27 kg/m2 and 43 kg/m2, inclusive for those with obesityrelated comorbidities including hypertension, dyslipidemia, and sleep apnea Patients with serious or unstable current or past medical conditions
